titles: A discourse about the state of true happinesse deliuered in certaine sermons in Oxford, and at Pauls Crosse: by Robert Bolton.
author: Bolton, Robert, 1572-1631.
publisher: Imprinted by Felix Kyngston, for Edmund Weauer, and are to be sold at his shop, at the great North-gate of Pauls Church,
notes: Running title reads: A discourse of true happinesse.
Reproduction of the original in the Central Library (Bristol, Eng.).
keywords: Happiness --  Religious aspects --  Early works to 1800.
